text.div:
SARS Coronavirus 2 Antibodies, Qualitative and Quantitative

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    94505-5 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    94506-3 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    94507-1 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG Ab [Presence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Rapid immunoassay
    94508-9 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Rapid immunoassay
    94511-3 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) ORF1ab region [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    94547-7 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG+IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    94559-2 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) ORF1ab region [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    94562-6 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgA Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    94563-4 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    94661-6 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ab [Interpretation] in Serum or Plasma
    94720-0 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgA Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    94761-4 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG Ab [Presence] in DBS by Immunoassay
    94762-2 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    94768-9 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgA Ab [Presence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Rapid immunoassay
    94769-7 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    95410-7 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) neutralizing antibody [Titer] in Serum by pVNT
    95411-5 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) neutralizing antibody [Presence] in Serum by pVNT
